title: Rito Pls
body:
Implement a attack minion only key - similar to the target enemy champions only key (~) This would be very handy for champions like nasus and help everyone cs without getting bodyblocked cs.

Also I've heard talk about A-click targeting the target closest to where you click rather than closest to your champion. Please do this would be forever in-love with you. X O{{champion:67}}

replies.body: Trust a filthy Vayne player to need help to snowball correctly.
just a filthy bronzelord who thinks mf is in a tier all alone as balanced. lol pls

> [{quoted}](name=Arclight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Yx5agj8P,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-15T08:09:26.420+0000)
>
> just a filthy bronzelord who thinks mf is in a tier all alone as balanced. lol pls

She has no mobility, or CC which Vayne has both.
MF is balanced.

MF has plenty of mobility: her out of combat movespeed is just stupid thanks to her passive. She has greivous wounds on W, and an AoE slow on E. What else do you need to have something that is insane? The only reason you are classing her as balanced is she has no solo chase potential, but that is to be expected of a markswoman, who shouldn't need to chase anyway (should be able to deal enough damage from range before they can get away).

tl;dr - MF is stronger than you think, you should read more walls of text.
Thankyou for reading my lecture, I'm here all week.
Mate, hes not bronze, level 27 doesn't mean bronze, just yet..
ballsackboy's main was leaked on GD ages ago. git with it. nublord
